attributes.title: App doesn't really do anything
attributes.review: This app only shows a splash screen and a notifications permissions pop up. I think this violates App Store guidelines? You need to login and give it your email to do anything else it seems.

attributes.title: Best app out there
attributes.review: Phenomenal app!!! Highly recommended to any person who loves freedom and America!

attributes.title: Top kek
attributes.review: Great way to stay up to date with the campaign!

attributes.title: Great app
attributes.review: Truly makes you feel apart of the campaign

attributes.title: GREAT app!
attributes.review:
This app is awesome. There is a social aspect as well as all types of different ways to gain information. Love it!
#MakeAmericaGreatAgain

attributes.title: #TrumpPence2016💙🇺🇸❤️
attributes.review:
Love this app , so much fun ! Awesome way to connect with others. Fun games& Lots of facts 😃👍🏻! Fun way to earn points ! #TeamTrump 
#MAGA🇺🇸 #TrumpTrain🚂💨💨💨 #TrumpPence16💙🇺🇸❤️ #VoteForTrump #NeverHillary #StopCrookedHillary

attributes.title: Love it big league
attributes.review: Let's do this and make America great again. Trump for the White House and Crooked Hillary for the jail house! #MAGA #TrumpPence16

attributes.title: Perfect! 🇺🇸
attributes.review: Amazing app! ❤️ it! 🇺🇸I trust and believe in Donald Trump to make America Great Again! He has given me no reason not to! 🇺🇸

attributes.title: Informational
attributes.review: Very informational app if you wish to learn more about Trump and his campaign.

attributes.title: Great app
attributes.review: Love this app since I don't have a Facebook or Twitter account. It has all of his rallies and times updated which is great. MAGA!!!
